description: This dataset, which is part of CMSs Medicare Provider Utilization and Payment Data, details information on Durable Medical Equipment, Prosthetics, Orthotics and Supplies (DMEPOS) products and services provided to Medicare beneficiaries via referrals through physicians and other healthcare professionals.Â  This data covers 2013 and 2014.
keyword: Publically Available Data File - for download
title: Medicare Referring Provider DMEPOS PUF
